title: Online Alternating Minimization
description: Online Alternating Minimization
url: https://github.com/IBM/online-alt-min
tag: "Others"
tags: ["Others"]
weight: 1
---



## Description

Code implementing a novel online alternating minimization (AM) algorithm for training deep neural networks that was developed as an alternative to backpropagation to avoid vanishing and exploding gradients, and handle non-differentiable nonlinearities.

## Main Contributors

Choromanska, Cowen, Kumaravel, Luss, Rigotti,  Rish, Diachille, Gurev, Kingsbury, Tejwani, Bouneffouf

## Description

Code implementing a novel online alternating minimization (AM) algorithm for training deep neural networks that was developed as an alternative to backpropagation to avoid vanishing and exploding gradients, and handle non-differentiable nonlinearities.
